column8: EPA7慢性照護 信賴程度
column10: 教師給CCC回饋（僅CCC委員可讀，對學員隱藏）
column11: 1.教師在旁逐步共同操作2.教師在旁必要時協助   3.教師事後重點確認            4.必要時知會教師確認    5.獨立執行

column6: Sjogren's syndrome with interstitial lung disease

column9: 可再加強對不同機轉尿失禁、用藥及治療等等的了解
慢籤的病患，不只是複製藥歷及帶入相同藥物，適時察覺病人病況的變化亦相當重要。

一個月的門診訓練，需聚焦於特定問題的背景知識，例如盛行率高及對社會影響層面極大的鬱症，思覺失調症，睡眠障礙等。執行門診會診訓練的風險包括自傷 ／自殺，傷人／暴力的辨識。不知道專業知識或診斷及治療處置，可尋求老師（精神專科主治醫師）的指導。


謙遜並且學習動機佳，遇到師長問你問題時，能之後查找textbook與paper來學習
column10: ，把握重點的能力尚待加強，學習態度良好，亦展示誠信正直，能參與討論。

column6: *. Coronary artery disease, single-vessel disease with angina pectoris, status post percutaneous coronary intervention to right coronary artery (failed to cross the chronic total occlusion lesion) on 2025-01-07; and percutaneous coronary intervention to right coronary artery but fail on 2025-04-14 *. Pericardial effusion, status post pericardiocentesis *. Paroxysmal atrial fibrillation
column9:
學員知道該怎麼做嗎？是否有足夠的背景知識？
足夠

是否意識到任務的風險和可能的併發症？
可以

如果遇到特殊病人狀況，發生風險或併發症時你會怎麼做？」或可直接問「你不知道該做什麼時，你會怎麼做？」
會適度反映狀況，尋求協助

column6: *. Coronary artery disease, triple vessel disease, status post percutaneous coronary intervention with stenting to proximal-middle LAD(3.0X38mm X-S stent, dissection) and with stenting to ostium-proximal LAD(3.5X2.3mm X-S stent, OS) on 20250421 *. End stage renal disease under regular hemodialysis *. Hypertensive cardiovascular disease *. Type 2 diabetes mellitus with nephropathy *. Hyperlipidemia *. Gout arthritis *. Degenerative spondylolisthesis, L2 on L3, L3 on L4, grade I; HIVD, 2-3, L3-4 with spinal stenosis and right radiculopathy status post operation 16 years ago *. Right hip status post total hip replacement 3 year ago

column6: *. Optic neuritis, suspected recurrence of neuromyelitis optica spectrum disorders *. Neuromyelitis optica spectrum disorders (20190821, IVIG, plasma exchange and pulse therapy), under prednisolone and azathioprine treatment with two episodes of recurrence (20200326 and 20200513), and shift to rituximab (induction dosing 375 mg/m2/dose, weekly for 4 consecutive infusions, since 20200702; and then 1000mg every 6 months or depends on CD19 B cells; last time: 20241227) with suspected disease progression *. Cushing's syndrome, improving *. Dry eye, Sjogren syndrome related *. Obesity *. Iron deficiency anemia
column9:
呈祥自己會查房並回報病人狀況，遇到不懂的，會提問，學習態度積極認真。
NMOSD屬罕病，症狀多元，此病人以rituximab治療，效果不錯，但IgG會低，也曾因此在感染的狀況下，持續發燒，考慮換藥。可以趁機學習一下
column10: 呈祥態度積極主動，自己會查房並回報病人狀況，也會提問題，是認真負責的醫師
